page.title: 12Walton_in_Gordano_a study.
page.content: Walton_in_Gordano is a sleepy little village just outside Clevedon.There are between nineteen to thirty buildings,they are approximately 200 to 300 years old.The population is about 70 people and 25 are children. There is a bus service to Bristol every hour and a bus service to Weston_super_Mare.The amenities in the village are ...the Manor House...the village hall...the corner shop and Post Office...the church(St. Pauls)... and the bus service. Sir William Miles used to own the Manor House and some land around it.The main transport through the village is the motor car.It can be very congested around the centre of the village because of parked cars.
